description: Windows host dashboard for telegraf metrics pumped into influxdb

targets.query: SELECT last("Processes") FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "objectname" = 'System' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last("Threads") FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "objectname" = 'System' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" = 'C:' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("Processor_Queue_Length") FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "objectname" = 'System' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" = 'C:' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("Current_Disk_Queue_Length") FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "objectname" = 'LogicalDisk'  AND "instance" = 'C:' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" = 'D:' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("Current_Disk_Queue_Length") FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "objectname" = 'LogicalDisk'  AND "instance" = 'D:' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("Available_Bytes") as "Available Bytes", mean("Pool_Nonpaged_Bytes") as "Pool Nonpaged Bytes", mean("Pool_Paged_Bytes") as "Pool Paged Bytes" FROM "win_mem" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(linear) ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean("Cache_Faults_persec") as "Cache Faults persec", mean("Demand_Zero_Faults_persec") as "Demand Zero Faults persec", mean("Page_Faults_persec") as "Page Faults persec", mean("Pages_persec") as "Pages persec", mean("Transition_Faults_persec") as "Transition Faults persec" FROM "win_mem" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(linear) ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("Context_Switches_persec") AS "Context Switches persec" FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance fill(linear)
SELECT mean("System_Calls_persec") AS "System Calls / sec" FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance fill(linear)
SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") AS "% Free Space" FROM "win_disk" WHERE "instance" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(linear)

SELECT mean("Percent_Disk_Read_Time") AS "% Disk Read Time", mean("Percent_Disk_Write_Time") AS "% Disk Write Time" FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance fill(0)
SELECT mean("Current_Disk_Queue_Length") AS "Current Disk Queue Length" FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

SELECT mean("Bytes_Received_persec") AS "Bytes Received persec", mean("Bytes_Sent_persec") AS "Bytes Sent persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /$network$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance fill(linear)

SELECT mean("Packets_Received_persec") AS "Packets Received / sec", mean("Packets_Sent_persec") AS "Packets Sent / sec" FROM "win_net" WHERE "host" =~ /$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /$network$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance fill(linear)
SELECT mean("Percent_Processor_Time") as "% Processor Time" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(linear)
SELECT mean("Handle_Count") as "Handle Count" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT mean("Private_Bytes") as "Private Bytes" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT mean("Virtual_Bytes") as "Virtual Bytes" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT mean("Working_Set") as "Working Set" FROM "win_proc" WHERE host =~ /$hostname$/ AND instance =~ /$process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(0)

list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_disk" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

list.label: Process
list.name: process
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_proc" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

list.label: Network Interface
list.name: network
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_net" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

title: Windows: Performance Counters
